GSP29vnyps51u:2: nyā. pa. prame. 1 evaṃ saparikaraṃ pramāṇaṃ viśodhitam /
GSP29vnyps51u:4: tatra yat punaḥ ṣaṭsaptādirūpeṇa padārthān vibhajya
GSP29vnyps51u:11: sa ca bhāvābhāvabhedena dvidhā” iti, tat tāvat “asadvyapadeśānneti cenna,
GSP29vnyps51u:14: yadapi ca--- dravyaguṇakarmasāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyarūpeṇa bhāvarūpāṇāṃ padārthānāṃ ṣoḍhā parisaṃkhyānam, tadapi vaiśeṣikādhikaraṇe “samavāyābhyupagamācca sāmyādanavasthiteḥ” iti sūtrakāraireva samavāyākhyapadārthāntaradūśaṇena parāstam /
GSP29vnyps51u:16: yaścānyonyamatyantatulyeṣu muktātmādiṣu mitho vyāvṛttadhījananāya dravyatvādihetunā viśeṣākhyaḥ padārthaḥ kalpyate, sopi tulyanyāyatayā sūtrakārairdūṣitaprāya eva /
GSP29vnyps51u:19: api cānityeṣu dravyeṣu tāvajjātiguṇapādibhireva vyāvṛttadhīḥ sidhyatīti nityeṣu hi viśeṣonyaḥ kalpyate; yathāhuḥ--- “nityadravyavṛttayontyā
GSP29vnyps51u:27: tadatyantasāmyavatsu mukteṣu nityeṣvapi hi tatsāmyasyaiva saṃrakṣaṇāya dharmigrāhakasiddhā yāvadātmabhāvinaste te viśeṣā na parityaktāḥ /
GSP29vnyps51u:29: kalpayiṣyāmaḥ, ekasyaiva sarvadeśakāleṣvekātapatratayā sarvaśrutisiddhatvāt, asyaiva ca sāmānyaśabdairviśeṣaśabdaiśca rūḍhito yogatastattadvasatuviśiṣṭatvādinā ca tattatprakaraṇānuguṇaṃ śarīrake pratipādyatvasthāpanāt /
GSP29vnyps51u:33: muktadaśāyāṃ nityebhyaḥ kiṃ vaiṣmyamiti cet, kiṃ tena ? /
GSP29vnyps51u:35: siddhairapi tadvyavahāre prāktanopādhibhedaireva tattatpramāṇapramitaiḥ pratisaṃhitaiḥ sarvanirvāhāt
GSP29vnyps51u:36: etena muktānāṃ mitho vibhaktabuddhirapi nirvyūḍhā; na hi teṣāmekarūpaḥ
GSP29vnyps51u:39: tadatadvibhāgo hi tatkālavartinaivaṃ dharmeṇeti na niyamaḥ,
GSP29vnyps51u:40: atatkālavartināpi tanniṣṭhatayopalabhyamānena tatsiddheḥ; na hyatītaḥ saṃsāro muktātmasvarūpamupalabhamānairnopalabhyate, upalabhyamāno vānyaniṣṭhaḥ pratibhāti /
GSP29vnyps51u:43: teṣāmapi hi satyasaṃkalpānāṃ vicitrāḥ saṃkalpecchādaya riśvarasyevāniyatadeśakālaviṣayāparyanuyojyasāmagrīkā anādyanantasaṃtānavantaḥ santīti kimanyena viśeṣeṇa ? /
GSP29vnyps51u:44: api ca yaddarśane yatra yadāropo na bhavati sa hi tasya tato bhedaḥ /
GSP29vnyps51u:46: sa cet svarūpabhūtohantvamādirūpeṇa bhātaḥ parāropaṃ pratirundhyāt,
GSP29vnyps51u:49: svaparanirvāhakāste viśeṣāḥ, iti cet, kiṃ ta eva? /
GSP29vnyps51u:50: api ca pṛthaktve vidyamāne kiṃ tairviśeṣaiḥ ? /
GSP29vnyps51u:51: pṛthaktvasyaikajātisaṃgṛhītatvānna tatopi vyāvṛttadhīrīti cet, tarhi tato na kvacidapi syāt /
GSP29vnyps51u:53: viśeṣatvaṃ nāma jātirnāstīti cet, kiṃ tat ? /
GSP29vnyps51u:54: upādhiriticet, kiṃ tato na saṃgrahaḥ?, tathā sati kvacidapi
GSP29vnyps51u:58: “tadananyatvamārambhaṇaśabdādibhyaḥ---” ityādibhiḥ sūtraiḥ kāryadaśāyāmupādānasyāvasthāntarāpattimātrameva, na punaḥ parābhimatamavayavyākhyaṃ dravyamastīti samarthanād ghaṭādyavayavyabhāve tadāśritaghaṭatvādisāmānyamavayavisamavetatayābhyupagataguṇādayastadubhayārambhaprakriyājālaṃ ca nirmūlitam /
GSP29vnyps51u:59: yaccopādānasya ghaṭatvādirūpamavasthāntaraṃ saṃyogaviśeṣādirūpaṃ, tat parairapi kāryatayābhyupetamupalambhādibhiśca tathaiva sidhyatīti na
GSP29vnyps51u:61: tataḥ sarveṣāṃ dravyāṇāṃ svarūpatonādyanantatvāt kāryadravyatvātmatvādimātrameva śiṣyate /
GSP29vnyps51u:65: gotvādijātivyavahāropapatteḥ, atirekavādepi saṃsthānasya saṃpratipannatvācca saṃsthānameva jāti /
GSP29vnyps51u:66: saṃsthānaṃ nāma svāsādhāraṇaṃ rūpamiti yathāvastu saṃsthānamanusaṃdheyam” iti /
GSP29vnyps51u:71: atiriktasāmānyamabhyupagacchatopi hi tadupalakṣaṇaṃ saṃsthānamiṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ ca /
GSP29vnyps51u:72: prativyaktiniyataṃ saṃsthānaṃ kathamanuvṛttapratyayakāraṇamiti cet, kathaṃ vā tajjātīyasya lakṣaṇaṃ bhavati ? /
GSP29vnyps51u:73: anuvṛttajātyantarasaṃgṛhītopādhirūpatayeti cet, tāvataiva gavādivyavahārasiddhau kimanyena tathāpyantatonuvṛttaṃ sāmānyaṃ kvacidabhyupagantavyam,
GSP29vnyps51u:74: yatrānanyathāsiddhiḥ; anyathopādhisaṃgrahasyāpyasaṃbhavāditi cet, tavāpi vā tatra sāmānyamupalakṣaṇena saṃgṛhyate, na vā ?
GSP29vnyps51u:77: vyāvṛttānāmapi svabhāvata eva kāsāṃcit vyaktīnāṃ tadvyañjakatvaniyatiriti
GSP29vnyps51u:78: cet, sa eva svabhāvaḥ kiṃ na vyavahāraṃ niyachet /
GSP29vnyps51u:79: nirviṣayaḥ kathaṃ vyavahāraḥ syāditi cet, tāsāmeva vyaktīnāṃ viṣayatvāt /
GSP29vnyps51u:81: cet, vyāvṛttānāmanuvṛttavyañjakatve sarvatra tadvyaktiḥ kiṃ na syāt ? /
GSP29vnyps51u:82: saṃbandhāsaṃbandhābhyāṃ niyamāditi cenna, saṃbandhasyāpi samavāyanāmnaḥ sārvatrikatvābhyupagamāt tatrāpyabhivyaktipratiniyamasya mṛgyatvāt,
GSP29vnyps51u:83: nānāsamavāyavādepi vyaktisvabhāvaniyamasya dustyajatvāt, tathāpi dṛṣṭaikagovyaktervyaktyantare soyamiti pratyabhijñānaṃ kathaṃ syāt ? ayaṃ gaurityekavyaktau vyutpāditaśca kathaṃ vyaktyatyantarepi tacchabdavācyatāṃ
GSP29vnyps51u:84: pratīyāt ? iti cet, tavāpi vā katham ? /
GSP29vnyps51u:85: ekadharmasamavāyāditi cet ? tenaiva dharmeṇa svato militasya samavāyasyaiva nityaṃ sarvatra vṛttyabhyupagamena sarvatra
GSP29vnyps51u:87: kāsāṃcideva vyaktīnāṃ tadvyañjakatvasvābhāvyād vyavasthokteti cet, tarhi tāsāmeva vyaktīnāṃ pratisaṃdhānavyavahārayorviṣayatvamastu /
GSP29vnyps51u:88: tathā sati bhrāntatvaṃ tayoḥ syāditi cenna, tadvyaktitvena pratisaṃdhānāderabhāvāt ; api tarhi tathātvena vyaktisvarūpātiriktaṃ tathātvaṃ nāmāntareṇa jātireva syāditi cet, tajjātivyañjakaṃ tattadekavyaktisvarūpātiriktaṃ kiṃ na jātyantaraṃ syāt ? /
GSP29vnyps51u:89: upādhiviśeṣa evāyaṃ pratiniyatāśraya iti cet, evaṃ tarhi pratiniyatapratiyogikaṃ svabhāvaniyataṃ
GSP29vnyps51u:91: tasmārakataditaravibhāgaḥ kutastya iti cet, tadvyañjakataditaravibhāgaste kutastyaḥ ? /
GSP29vnyps51u:93: saṃbandhasādṛśyayorabhāve kathaṃ smārakatvamiti cet, tayorvā katham ? /
GSP29vnyps51u:95: kāryadarśanāt kalpyate iti cet, tulyam; anyathā saṃbandhaṃ sādṛśyaṃ
GSP29vnyps51u:96: vaikamupādāya tadanyasya kathaṃ smārakatvamiti codyasya durvāratvāt /
GSP29vnyps51u:97: na cātra sādṛśyaṃ nāṅgīkurmaḥ, sausādṛśyarūpatvābhyupagamāt sāmānyasya /
GSP29vnyps51u:98: nāmāntareṇa parābhimatajātisvīkāraḥ iti cet, vyāvṛttānāṃ saṃniveśādīnāmeva pratiniyatapratiyogismārakasvabhāvatayā sādṛśyarūpatvāt /
GSP29vnyps51u:101: evaṃ sāmānyādiṣu sūtrakārādibhirnirasteṣu pariśiṣṭā dravyaguṇakarmarūpāstrayaḥ padārthāḥ iti kecidācāryāḥ //
GSP29vnyps51u:102: nyā. pa. prame. 2 anye tu manyante---yathā tatpratīteranyathāsiddhatayā te padārthā bhāṣyakārādibhirnirasyante, tathā karmāpi, iti, ye tāvadiha sarvatra sūryaparispandādivadapratyakṣaṃ karma phalānumeyamicchanti tatra yayā sāmagryā karmaṇaḥ siddhirabhimatā tayaiva dṛṣṭaṃ karmaphalaṃ sādhyatām, kimantarā kalpitena karmaṇā ? /
GSP29vnyps51u:103: tathāpi cet kḷptiḥ, anyatrāpi kālaviprakarṣādarśanepi sāmagrīkāryayormadhye anyasya kḷptiprasaṅgaḥ; tathaiva ca tratrāpītyanavasthā syāt /
GSP29vnyps51u:104: ye ca “pratyakṣaṃ karma” ityāhuḥ, tairapi nūnaṃ karmaphalatvenābhyupagamasaṃyogavibhāgātiriktaṃ nipuṇanirīkṣaṇepi nopalabhyata iti manyāmahe /
GSP29vnyps51u:106: na ca vācyaṃ yāvatsaṃyogaṃ calatipratyayaprasaṅga iti,
GSP29vnyps51u:108: tata eva hyuttarakāle saṃyoge vartamānepyacaladiti bhūtānusaṃdhānamupapannam /
GSP29vnyps51u:109: nanu pravāhamadhyasthite sthāṇau pūrvasalilaskandhaviyogaḥ uttarasalilaskandhayogaśca dṛśyate, na ca tatra calatvamicchāmaḥ;
GSP29vnyps51u:110: vyomādaya eva sthiradeśatvena vivakṣitāḥ iti cenna, pravāhasya tato viśeṣādarśanāt; laulyam viśeṣaḥ iti cet, tarhi saṃyogavibhāgātiriktaṃ laulyarūpaṃ karmapratyakṣamiti kathaṃ tadapahnavaḥ ? iti /
GSP29vnyps51u:111: tatrāhuḥ---yā nāma karmasāmagrī tvayeṣyate sā tattatkarmaphalatayābhimataṃ saṃyogaviśeṣamutpādayantī niyatasvabhāvameva tamutpādayati /
GSP29vnyps51u:112: ata eva eva saṃyogonekaniṣṭhopi san kvaciccalatipratyaṃyaṃ kvacit saṃyogamātrapratyayaṃ ca janayati, yathaika eva samavāyoguṇaguṇibhyāmaviśeṣeṇa svato militopi san kvacidāśrayapratyayaṃ kvacidāśritapratyayaṃ ca janayati, na hyāśrayabhāva āśritabhāvo vā
GSP29vnyps51u:119: idaṃ tu manyāmahe--- atirekepi guṇavargānna rāśyantaraṃ karma,
GSP29vnyps51u:124: nyā. pa. prame. 3 tatra cātmaguṇatayābhimateṣu sukhaduḥkhecchādveṣaprayatnāḥ pañca tattadutpādakatayābhimatabuddhiviśeṣānatiriktā vedārthasaṃgrahe samarthitāḥ /
GSP29vnyps51u:125: dharmādharmau vihitaniṣiddhakriyāsādhyatayābhimatāvājñāvato rājña iva sarvapraśāsiturīśvarasyānugrahanigrahākhyabuddhiviśeṣarūpau bhāṣyādiṣu bahuṣu pradeśeṣu prapañcitau /
GSP29vnyps51u:126: yaḥ punaḥ saṃskāraḥ sa tāvadbuddhiviśeṣātmanoktaḥ, na ca tatprayuktaḥ;
GSP29vnyps51u:128: nyā. pa. prame. 4 yadyapi “indriyasyendriyasyārthe” ityādigītāślokeṣu bhāṣyakārairvāsanāyā
GSP29vnyps51u:129: pravṛttihetutvavacanājjñānavāsanāviśeṣātiriktā karmavāsanā nāsti, tathāpi jñānavāsanā durapahnavā, tataśca tadāśrayamātraṃ vicāryam, tatra dharmabhūtajñānasya dravyatvaṃnyāyatattvātmasiddhibhāśyādisiddhamanusaratāṃ tanniṣṭhasmṛtyākhyavikārotpādakaḥ saṃskāro 'pi tanniṣṭhaḥ prāptaḥ;
GSP29vnyps51u:131: nyā. pa. prame. 5 ye tu paraparibhāṣamanusarantastadanuguṇaṃ tasya guṇatvaṃ gṛhṇanti, teṣāmātmanyeva saṃskāraḥ, iti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP29vnyps51u:132: na ca buddhornityatvaṃ saṃkocavikāsādidaśābhedaṃ cābhyupagacchadbhiradravyatvaṃ tasyāḥ suvacam;
GSP29vnyps51u:138: yathā ca dravyatvaviśeṣaṇatvādibhirna virodha iṣyate, evamatrāpi,
GSP29vnyps51u:140: ato jñānaṃ dravyam, tadavasthāviśeṣāstvadravyāṇīti saṃskārākhyavikārāsthitirapi tatraiva yuktā
GSP29vnyps51u:143: sthitasthāpakau tu karmanivṛttāvapi tadavinābhūtasaṃyogaviśeṣatvaṃ vaktuṃ yuktam //
GSP29vnyps51u:144: nyā. pa. prame. 6 ye ca bhagavatonantā maṅgalaguṇāḥ prakīrtyante, te sarvepi ṣāṅguṇyavitatirūpāḥ iti saṃmatam /
GSP29vnyps51u:148: ṣaṭsu ca guṇeṣu balaṃ dhāraṇasāmarthyam, aiśvaryaṃ niyamanaśaktiḥ;
GSP29vnyps51u:152: na ca jñānaśaktyorapyevaṃ mithontarbhāvaḥ śakyaḥ, ajñeṣvapi dravyeṣu śaktidarśanāt, aśakteṣvapi jñānadarśanāt /
GSP29vnyps51u:154: śaktiviśeṣastu jñānaṃ syāditi cet, kosau śaktiśabdārthaḥ ? /
GSP29vnyps51u:155: vilakṣaṇo guṇaviśeṣaḥ prabhākarādinayena padārthāntaraṃ vā iti cet, na tarhi jñānasya tadviśeṣatā sidhyet /
GSP29vnyps51u:157: tadā na kevalaṃ jñānasya, api tu sarvasyaiva śaktitvaṃ prāptam, sarvasyāpi pradhānakāraṇatayābhimate kasmiṃścidviśeṣaṇatvenāvasthānāt /
GSP29vnyps51u:158: nanvevamudayanādīnāmiva svarūpasahakārivyatiriktaśaktyabhāvaḥ prasaktaḥ iti cet, ananyathāsiddhayuktivaśādāgamabalādvā tatsiddheḥ /
GSP29vnyps51u:162: sā cedupādānaṃ, sūkṣmandravyamevāsau syāditi na vivādaḥ //
GSP29vnyps51u:163: nyā. pa. prame. 7 athāciddravyaviśeṣaguṇān paśyāmaḥ--- tatra śabdādayaḥ pañca tattadbhūtavartinaḥ pratyakṣādibalādabhyupagatāḥ /
GSP29vnyps51u:171: paratvāparatve api sukhādicchāyayā; na hi tattadupādhyavacchinnadeśakālaviśeṣasaṃbandhātirikte paratvāparatve paśyāmaḥ /
GSP29vnyps51u:172: tatkalpane ca prāktvapratyaktvādayopi hi bahavo guṇāstulyanyāyāḥ kalpyāḥ syuḥ /
GSP29vnyps51u:173: evaṃ sadasadguṇapradarśanaprakriyayā saṃkhyāparimāṇagurutvadravatvasnehānāṃ tattvamavasātavyam, ityadravyeṣveṣā dik //
GSP29vnyps51u:174: nyā. pa. prame. 8 atha dravyāṇi vimṛśyante--- tatra tāvat kaumārilābhimatavibhuśabdākhyadravyavādaḥ śabdasyācidavasthāviśeṣatvena śrutyādisiddhatvānnirākāryaḥ /
GSP29vnyps51u:178: ityāhuḥ, tadetad dravyaṃ tāvadabhyupagacchāmaḥ; tathā hyuktaṃ varadagurubhistattvasāre--- “tamo nāma dravyaṃ bahulaviralaṃ mecakacalaṃ pratīmaḥ kenāpi kvacidapi na bādhaśca dadṛśe ataḥ kalpyo hetuḥ pramitirapi śābdī vijayate nirālokaṃ cakṣuḥ prathayati hi tad darśanavaśāt” iti /
GSP29vnyps51u:180: etena viyati vitatānāṃ sūkṣmāṇāṃ pṛthivyavayavānāṃ kṛṣṇo guṇastama iti pakṣopi pratikṣiptaḥ; sāśrayasyaiva tasya grahaṇavirodhābhāvāt,
GSP29vnyps51u:182: sparśarūparasānāṃ ca śabdagandhavad bhrāntau pramitau vā
GSP29vnyps51u:184: evaṃ dravyatve siddhe kṛṣṇavarṇasya dravyasya pṛthivītvamevābhyupagantumucitam, “yat kṛṣṇaṃ tadannasya” iti śruteḥ /
GSP29vnyps51u:185: yadyapi pṛthivyāṃ pākaviśeṣavaśāt śuklādirūpaṃ, nānyatra pākādapi bhavati;
GSP29vnyps51u:190: nanvevamākāśameva dravyāntarasaṃsargānnīlaṃ tama ityupalabhyate iti syāditi cet, na syāt, ākāśe tama iti pṛthagupalambhasvārasyāt,
GSP29vnyps51u:191: dravnayāntaratve tu kalpanāgauravāt, antatotrāpi pañcīkaraṇena dravyāntarasaṃsargasyābhyupagatatvācca iti /
GSP29vnyps51u:196: divābhītānāṃ viśiṣṭāñjanarañjitākṣāṇāṃ cālokanirapekṣameva cakṣuṣaiva padārthā gṛhyante /
GSP29vnyps51u:200: pṛthivyādīni pañca bhūtāni manaśca triguṇadravyapariṇativiśeṣatayā śrutyādisiddhatvānna pṛthagdravyāṇi
GSP29vnyps51u:207: digutpattiśrutiśca tadupādhikatannirvāhakasṛṣṭyopapannā; anyathā dyupṛthivyantarikṣādivat triguṇapariṇativiśeṣataiva syāt, na pṛthagdravyatā /
GSP29vnyps51u:208: na caivaṃ kālepi prasaṅgaḥ, nityasya kālasya bhagavatparāśarādibhiḥ
GSP29vnyps51u:213: tasya hi cetanatvādibhiḥ saṃgrahasaṃbhavepyavāntaravailakṣaṇyajñāpanāya pṛthaksaṃkhyānaṃ prācāmanādivācāṃ ca, anyathā prakriyāntareṇācetaneṣvapi saṃgrahaprasaṃgāt /
GSP29vnyps51u:214: viviktaṃ ca bhagavatā parāśareṇa--- “paramātmātmanoryogaḥ paramārtha itīṣyate /
GSP29vnyps51u:215: mithyaitadanyadravyaṃ hi naiti taddravyatāṃ yataḥ” // iti /
GSP29vnyps51u:221: bhoktṛbhogyaniyantṝṇāṃ sadātmanaikadravyatvādipakṣā api nirviśeṣasanmātrapakṣavad vyāghātaśrutivirodhādibhirbahuśo bhāṣyādiṣu nirastāḥ /
GSP29vnyps51u:229: iti śrīkavitārkikasiṃhasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīmadveṅkaṭanāthasya vedāntācāryasya kṛtiṣu nyāyapariśuddhau prameyādhyāye prathamamāhnikam //
